entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story who is trying to keep a secret from Ron and Hermione.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend who is complaining about homework.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Harry's other friend who is also concerned about homework and Ron's behavior.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: The teacher who is imposing a punishment on Harry that he does not want to discuss with his friends.

entities.name: room
entities.description: Umbridge's room where the punishment is being imposed.

relationships.description: Harry and Umbridge are engaged in a private battle of wills, with Harry trying to resist Umbridge's punishment.
Ron is concerned about the amount of homework he has, and Hermione is also worried about it.
Harry is keeping a secret from Ron about what is happening in Umbridge's room.
Harry is also keeping a secret from Hermione about what is happening in Umbridge's room.
